title: Priest to Higher Powers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Call upon the gods of this world at night. You may ask the host a yes-or-no question, which they must answer truthfully to the best of their ability. 3 uses.
- Write a divine constellation in the stars at night. The host will send a message of your choice to someone. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are blessed by the heavens and kissed by the gods. You may not be modkilled, effects that use the host to negatively affect you don't work, and the host must literally kiss your Discord avatar on their device screen at the beginning of the game. They do not have to prove they did this but it's technically a host error if they dont >:(

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bring celestial judgment upon sinners and heretics. (Town goal)

desc:
Post 1596
*Wrapped forever in an angel's embrace, the bridge between this world and the next spun into a soul.*
